tokens.name: Sol
tokens.description: The sun of the our own solar system.

tokens.name: Mercury
tokens.description: The smallest and closest planet to the sun in the Solar System.

tokens.name: Venus
tokens.description: The second planet from the Sun.

tokens.name: Earth
tokens.description: The third planet from the sun. Also our home planet.

tokens.name: Mars
tokens.description: The fourth planet from the Sun and the second-smallest planet in the Solar System, being larger than only Mercury.

tokens.name: Jupiter
tokens.description: The fifth planet from the Sun and the largest in the Solar System.

tokens.name: Saturn
tokens.description: The sixth planet from the Sun and the second-largest in the Solar System, after Jupiter.

tokens.name: Uranus
tokens.description: The seventh planet from the Sun.

tokens.name: Neptune
tokens.description: The eighth and farthest-known Solar planet from the Sun.
